name: TaleOfTheWisp
description:
Submission for the Mini Jam 110

Don't forget your little helpers, every time you fail at something, it makes your next run easier.

Controls : 

movement : WASD

attack : M1 (mouse left button)

retry(summon wisp of power) : R

pause : ESC

Credit :

Sprites : https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset 

Music : https://opengameart.org/content/free-nes-music-pack

Sounds : Kenney.nl , https://opengameart.org/content/inventory-sound-effects , https://opengameart.org/content/punches-hits-swords-and-squishes , https://opengameart.org/users/starninjas, https://opengameart.org/content/gunloop-8bit, https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-death-whirl 

Special Thanks to : 

My teammate avstør, afaik he doesn't have a itch page
